meanings.definition: Having a specified number of stories or levels.
meanings.sent1: The storeyed building had three levels, each with its own unique design.
meanings.sent2: The storeyed house stood tall with multiple floors for each family member.
meanings.sent3: The storeyed apartment complex was so tall, it felt like a mini city!
meanings.sent4: Her storeyed imagination took her to different levels of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The storeyed tower loomed over the town, casting a long shadow.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or divided into stories or levels.
meanings.sent1: The storeyed bookshelf held a collection of tales from various authors.
meanings.sent2: The storeyed pagoda had intricate carvings on each level.
meanings.sent3: The storeyed cake was a delicious tower of layers and frosting.
meanings.sent4: His storeyed career took him through different levels of success and challenges.
meanings.sent5: The storeyed garden had plants arranged in tiers, creating a beautiful display.
